text: 4. The high nickel cobalt lithium manganate precursor of claim 1 or 2, wherein the tap density of said high nickel cobalt lithium manganate precursor is not less than 2.0g/cm3Specific surface area of 9-12m2(ii) g, bulk density 1.7-2.0g/cm3And the content of S is less than or equal to 0.18 percent.
